title: How to write $1,775.00 on a check - Quora

response.answer_text: Personally I would write it the shortest way possible, but it’s a matter of preference and the amount of space available on the cheque. There are 2 ways that I would write $1,775.00. I’m assuming that the word, “dollar” is already pre-printed on the cheque. Seventeen hundred and seventy-fiveOne thousand seven hundred and seventy-five
